naslov: Brela, LUKSUZNA VILLA / PANORAMSKI POGLED MORE - video / čitaj (prodaja)
opis: Ako tražite savršeno mjesto za odmor ili život, ne tražite dalje. Prodajemo luksuznu vilu u mirnom i lijepom dijelu Brela. Vila je površine 268m2 (netto 240m2) na okućnici od 379m2, koja ima četiri spavaće sobe sa kupaonicama, prostrani dnevni boravak, kuhinju, blagovaonicu, teretanu, konobu, radnu sobu, terasu... - građena kvalitetnim materijalima / useljenje planirano u travanj 2024.godine + PRIZEMLJE / SUTEREN: konoba, teretana, kupatilo, strojarnica + terasa + VISOKO PRIZEMLJE: dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovaonom, soba sa kupatilom, terasa, bazen + 1.KAT: 3 spavaće sobe sa tri kupatila + početak gradnje 2023.godine / useljenje travanj 2024.godine + energetska vrijednost A + vanjski bazen (25m2), teretana, vrt, parking, konoba, video nadzor, solari... Najveća prednost ove vile je njen predivan pogled na more, koji se pruža sa svake etaže. Možete uživati u zalascima sunca, mirisu mora i zvuku valova. Vila je udaljena zračne linije cca 500 metara od plaže, gdje možete plivati, sunčati se ili se baviti vodenim sportovima. U blizini su i brojni restorani, kafići, trgovine i kulturne znamenitosti... Brela su jedno od najljepših mjesta na Makarskoj rivijeri, poznato po svojoj bogatoj povijesti, kulturi i prirodi. Brela su idealno mjesto za odmor ili život, jer nudi razne aktivnosti i sadržaje za sve uzraste i ukuse. DETALJI NA UPIT NAPOMENA: detaljne slike i video, tlocrte, expose vile šaljemo na upit ! - ekskluzivna prodaja agencije #adriaINgroup - kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju 3% + pdv od prodajne cijene Cijenjeni klijenti, razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane za kupoprodaju, a sve sukladno Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. eng................................................ - exclusive sale of the agency #adriaINgroup - the buyer pays an agency commission of 3% + pdv of the sales price Dear clients, viewing the property is only possible with a signed brokerage contract, which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, and all in accordance with the Act on Brokerage in Real Estate Transactions. NOTE: we send detailed pictures and videos, floor plans, expose villas on request! If you are looking for the perfect place to vacation or live, look no further. We are selling a luxury villa in a quiet and beautiful part of Brela. The villa has an area of 268m2 (net 240m2) on a plot of 379m2, which has four bedrooms with bathrooms, a spacious living room, kitchen, dining room, gym, tavern, study, terrace... - built with quality materials / moving in planned for April 2024 + GROUND FLOOR / BASEMENT: tavern, gym, bathroom, engine room + terrace + HIGH GROUND FLOOR: living room with kitchen and dining room, bedroom with bathroom, terrace, swimming pool + 1ST FLOOR: 3 bedrooms with three bathrooms + start of construction in 2023 / moving in April 2024 + energy value A + outdoor pool (25m2), gym, garden, parking, tavern, video surveillance, solarium... The biggest advantage of this villa is its wonderful view of the sea, which extends from every floor. You can enjoy the sunsets, the smell of the sea and the sound of the waves. The villa is approximately 500 meters from the beach, where you can swim, sunbathe or engage in water sports. There are numerous restaurants, cafes, shops and cultural sights nearby... Brela is one of the most beautiful places on the Makarska Riviera, known for its rich history, culture and nature. Brela is an ideal place for vacation or life, because it offers various activities and facilities for all ages and tastes.
